meanings: within the limits of the possible[possibility]
possibility, 가능하다 (be) possible, feasible, potential, practicable, be within the range[bounds] of possibility,

vlive.korean: 가능해? Do you think you can do it? 듣기 View video NCT : J💚J💚J
vlive.english: Do you think you can do it?

vlive.korean: 그게 가능해? Is it possible? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
진짜로요? - 가능해요 그게? Really? - Is that even possible? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
역시! - 공연 끝나고 헬스가 가능해? Wow! - Is it possible to work out after a concert? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : First UNLOCK in Chicago❤
vlive.english: Wow! - Is it possible to work out after a concert?

vlive.korean: 한 사람이 중복 하트가 가능해요 - 계속 누를 수 있어요 - 그래요? One person can press hearts multiple times. - They can press it continuously. - Really? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: One person can press hearts multiple times. - They can press it continuously. - Really?

examples.korean: Profits of $20m look achievable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 2천만 달러 수익이 달성 가능해 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Profits of $20m look achievable. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What had seemed impossible now seemed a distinct possibility. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 불가능해 보였던 일이 이제는 분명히 가능해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What had seemed impossible now seemed a distinct possibility. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise. (Robert Fritz) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가능해 보이는 것 혹은 타당해 보이는 것만 선택한다면 스스로가 진정 원하는 것을 알 수 없고 타협만이 남게 된다. (로버트 프리츠, 지혜명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise. (Robert Fritz) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This concert was made possible by the kind patronage of Smith Industries. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 연주회는 스미스 산업의 친절한 후원으로 가능해 진 것이었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This concert was made possible by the kind patronage of Smith Industries. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I will be in a meeting all day tomorrow but can be reached after 5 p.m. if needed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 내일은 하루 종일 회의가 있지만 필요하면 오후 5시 이후에는 연락 가능해요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I will be in a meeting all day tomorrow but can be reached after 5 p.m. if needed. Add to Wordbook
